typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Model as string,
		Length as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CarsOutput
date derive(NameModel = concat(Name,Model)) ~> DerivedColumn1
CarsOutput derive(CurrentDate = currentDate()) ~> date
date aggregate(groupBy(CurrentDate),
	CarsCount = count()) ~> CarsbyYear
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['CleanCars'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CarsClean
CarsbyYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['CarsbyYearOutput'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CarsbyYearOutput
